channel.title: [PI] Marcbob's MTV 2 problem
channel.description:
I got this error in Marcbob's MTV2 client and server:
I am having problems..and i really need help as soon as possible. [b]PROBLEM 1:[/b] Okay so I just simply log in with the name i want owner to be..."Sagi". When i log in I am enable to play server..But when i close the client and try the client again, it is says 'Invalid Username or Password' or some random message..but when I try with an other name it logs me in..again when the client is restarted, the saved accounts cant be used to play. Any solution to this.
[b]PROBLEM 2:[/b] If PROBLEM 1 is related to this thing then please tell me how to fix this thing. When a Character file is saved, it has yelltag as Editable... But i really need help fast..:(
Hope some guy would help me.

item.title: [PI] Marcbob's MTV 2 problem
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Ok i got it…its working something must have been wrong with my PC

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Marcbob's MTV 2 problem
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:1, topic:363286”]I got this error in Marcbob’s MTV2 client and server:

I am having problems…and i really need help as soon as possible.
PROBLEM 1:
Okay so I just simply log in with the name i want owner to be…“Sagi”. When i log in I am enable to play server…But when i close the client and try the client again, it is says ‘Invalid Username or Password’ or some random message…but when I try with an other name it logs me in…again when the client is restarted, the saved accounts cant be used to play. Any solution to this.

PROBLEM 2:
If PROBLEM 1 is related to this thing then please tell me how to fix this thing. When a Character file is saved, it has yelltag as Editable… But i really need help fast…

Hope some guy would help me.[/quote]

Problem one I never had this problem or anything. You have to use the same password. There shouldnt be any other reason for it saying invalid

Problem 2 you change your yelltag by doing ::yelltag hi (for example that makes your yelltag hi so when you do ::yell hey anyone wanna pk it will say, [hi]Username: anyone wanna pk)

Read full topic
